11 abstract class Validator implements ValidatorInterface{
12  protected $modifiedMessage;
13  protected $message;
14  protected $member;
15  protected $value;
16  protected $severity;
17 
18 
23  public function validate_($value){
24  $this->value=$value;
25  if(!$this->validate($value)){
26  return new ConstraintViolation($this->_getMessage(), $value, $this->member, get_class($this),$this->severity);
27  }
28  return true;
29  }
30 
31  public function setValidationParameters($member,$params,$severity='warning',$message=null){
32  $this->setParams($params);
33  $this->member=$member;
34  $this->modifiedMessage=$message;
35  $this->severity=$severity;
36  }
37 
38  protected function setParams(array $params){
39  foreach ($params as $member=>$value){
40  $this->$member=$value;
41  }
42  }
43 
47  public function getMember() {
48  return $this->member;
49  }
50 
54  public function setMember($member) {
55  $this->member = $member;
56  }
57 
62  public function getParameters(): array {
63  return [];
64 
65  }
66 
70  protected function mergeMessages(){
71  if(!isset($this->modifiedMessage)){
72  return $this->message;
73  }else{
74  return $this->modifiedMessage;
75  }
76  }
77 
78  protected function _getMessage(){
79  $parameters=$this->getParameters();
80  $message=$this->mergeMessages();
81  foreach ($parameters as $param){
82  $message=str_replace("{".$param."}", $this->$param, $message);
83  }
84  return $message;
85  }
86 
87 }
